data.title: Saba Software - M&A Summary, Ownership, and Business Overview
data.meta_description:
Saba Software has acquired 4 companies of its own. A total of 1 acquisition came from private equity firms.
                 Saba Software has acquired in 1 US state, and 3 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include internet software and services (50%) and  software (50%).
data.text:
Saba Software M&A Summary

Saba Software has acquired 4 companies of its own. A total of 1 acquisition came from private equity firms.

Saba Software has acquired in 1 US state, and 3 countries. The Company’s most targeted sectors include internet software and services (50%) and software (50%).

Saba Software Ownership
